de.esoco.gwt.client

Class ServiceRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.gwt.client.ServiceRegistry

  • public class ServiceRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    A registry for standard services. An application-specific service can subclass standard services like CommandService. On creation of the service the application should then register the asynchronous interface of it's service through the method registerStandardServices(Object). This will make the implemented standard services available to generic code.

    • Method Detail

      • getAuthenticatedService

        public static AuthenticatedServiceAsync getAuthenticatedService()
        Returns the current command service. If no standard services have been registered by calling registerStandardServices(Object) this method will return NULL.
        Returns:
        The asynchronous interface of the current command service or NULL for none

      • getCommandService

        public static CommandServiceAsync getCommandService()
        Returns the current authenticated service. If no standard services have been registered by calling registerStandardServices(Object) this method will return NULL.
        Returns:
        The asynchronous interface of the current authenticated service or NULL for none

      • getStorageService

        public static StorageServiceAsync getStorageService()
        Returns the current storage service. If no standard services have been registered by calling registerStandardServices(Object) this method will return NULL.
        Returns:
        The asynchronous interface of the current storage service or NULL for none

      • init

        public static void init(CommandServiceAsync rServiceAsync)
        Initializes the service registry from a certain service class. The given class must be the asynchronous variant of a sub-interface of one of the GWT framework service classes that are based on CommandService. This method must be invoked by framework clients before the standard services are accessed.
        Parameters:
        rServiceAsync - The service class to initialize the registry from

      • registerStandardServices

        public static void registerStandardServices(java.lang.Object rServiceAsync)
        This method can be invoked to register the standard asynchronous service interfaces that are implemented by a certain application-specific service for generic use. The standard services can then be queried through the other static methods in this class.
        Parameters:
        rServiceAsync - The application-specific asynchronous service interface that extends one or more standard service interfaces
